definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Use your compasses to draw a circle to circle.
sentences.chinese: 用圓規畫圓必須要有圓心。

sentences.english: The circles movements became wilder and wilder and began making strange noises.
sentences.chinese: 畫圓的動作幅度越來越大，並且開始發出奇怪的聲音。

sentences.english: Inhale stretch the arms up in a circular motion.
sentences.chinese: 吸氣伸展手臂從體側畫圓向上。

sentences.english: He didn't have any clever tricks at all; he simply practiced drawing circles.
sentences.chinese: 他什麼奇巧的花招都沒有，單單就練畫圓圈圈。

sentences.english: You can also use circular or oval strokes for stiffing.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以用畫圓或者橢圓的方法來強化。

sentences.english: Let's draw a circle on a piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 板書，教書在一張白紙上畫圓示範。

sentences.english: The teacher asked his students to use their compasses to draw circles .
sentences.chinese: 老師要求學生們用圓規畫圓。

sentences.english: A compass needle points to the north.

definition: manipūra or manipura, the solar plexus chakra 查克拉, residing in the upper abdomen

pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
